Thank you for your kind support.

Hope all is well.

 

As discussed during our call with the loss adjustor, the following details are required for the BI estimation:

*	Daily sales figures for the outlets in April 2023 and April 2024

*	Monthly sales figures from April 2022 to date.

*	Monthly P & L / management accounts for the outlets from April 203 to end March 2024

Also please kindly clarify the monthly revenue for the catering division from April 2023.

 

Thank you for your kind support.


Best Regards,

Hagop

Hello Hinde,

 

Hope all is well.

 

As discussed during our call with the loss adjustor, the following details are required for the BI estimation:
